title: IRC29 Native Token Metadata Schema
description: A JSON schema for validating IRC29 compliant native token metadata

name.description: The human-readable name of the native token

description.description: The human-readable description of the token

decimals.description: Number of decimals the token uses (divide the token amount by decimals to get its user representation)

url.description: URL pointing to more resources about the token

logoUrl.description: URL pointing to an image resource of the token logo

logo.description: The svg logo of the token encoded as a byte string
